item.description: We'll start with dinner at 6 pm at Vito’s Tavern & Pizzeria in New Britain - great food! After dinner, we’ll go to the Hole in the Wall Theater and see “Christmas Live Old Time Radio.” Set in a radio studio with music from 1930’s and 40’s with voices such as Jack Benny, The Andrew Sisters, The Great Gildersleeve and more. You buy your dinner and theater tickets are $25. Reserve by Nov. 24, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to Vito’s 136 Main St.: I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main St., ramp top turn right, at next light turn right onto Chestnut Street, at next light turn right onto Main Street, facility immediately on left. Sponsored by Social Connections.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner & Theater
